md:
giải nghĩa từ "instructor" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

1. Instructor (noun)
	* Meaning: A person who teaches or trains others, especially in a particular skill or subject.
	* Vietnamese: Giáo viên, huấn luyện viên
	* Example sentence: "The instructor at the driving school was very patient with new students."
	* Related words: teacher, trainer, coach, mentor

2. Instructor (verb)
	* Meaning: To teach or train someone, especially in a particular skill or subject.
	* Vietnamese: Dạy, huấn luyện
	* Example sentence: "The company will instructor new employees on the company's policies and procedures."
	* Related words: teach, train, educate, guide
html:
giải nghĩa từ "instructor" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  1. Instructor (noun)

    • Meaning: A person who teaches or trains others, especially in a particular skill or subject.
    • Vietnamese: Giáo viên, huấn luyện viên
    • Example sentence: "The instructor at the driving school was very patient with new students."
    • Related words: teacher, trainer, coach, mentor

  2. Instructor (verb)

    • Meaning: To teach or train someone, especially in a particular skill or subject.
    • Vietnamese: Dạy, huấn luyện
    • Example sentence: "The company will instructor new employees on the company's policies and procedures."
    • Related words: teach, train, educate, guide
